Literature.Title: Tridecaptin M, a New Variant Discovered in Mud Bacterium, Shows Activity Against Colistin- And Extremely Drug-Resistant Enterobacteriaceae
Literature.Author: Jangra M, Kaur M, Tambat R, Rana R, Maurya SK, Khatri N, Ghafur A, Nandanwar H

Literature.Title: Purification and Biological Activity of Natural Variants Synthesized by Tridecaptin M Gene Cluster and in Vitro Drug-Kinetics of This Antibiotic Class.
Literature.Author: Jangra M, Kaur M, Podia M, Tambat R, Singh VP, Chandal N, Mahey N, Maurya N, Nandanwar H

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Rabbit erythrocytes:0% Hemolysis=100 µg/ml,Rabbit erythrocytes:25% Hemolysis=150 µg/ml,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:25% Cell death=100 µg/ml,Murine macrophage cells J774A.1:25% Cell death=100 µg/ml,Rabbit erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=128 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=4µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC BAA-1705(MIC=2µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC BAA-1706(MIC=4µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC BAA-2146(MIC=2µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 15380(MIC=1µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 29665(MIC=0.5µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae subsp. rhinoscleromatis ATCC 13384(MIC=4µg/ml),Klebsiella oxytoca MTCC 8295(MIC=2µg/ml),Klebsiella aerogenes MTCC 10208(MIC=4µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae MTCC 509(MIC=4µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=4µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 35218(MIC=4µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=16µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Choleraesuis ATCC 10708(MIC=4µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=2-8µg/ml),Candida albicans(no activity data),Escherichia coli mcr(MIC=4µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae CR(MIC=2-4µg/ml),Proteus mirabilis MTCC 1429(MIC=>16µg/ml),Serratia marcescens MTCC 97(MIC=8µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae P3R(MIC=64µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae GMCH 13(MIC=8µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae GMCH 15(MIC=16µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=64µg/ml)
